name: BOOKI
projectDescription: Booki est un site permettant aux usagers de trouver des hébergements et des activités dans la ville de leur choix.
workDescription: Ma mission ici était d'implémenter les maquettes Figma des versions desktop, tablette et mobile de la page d'accueil du site Booki avec HTML et CSS.

name: Pro Project B
projectDescription: This professional project involved developing a scalable backend system for handling large volumes of data.
workDescription: My role included setting up the server architecture, implementing RESTful APIs, and optimizing database queries.

name: Perso Project C
projectDescription: A personal project to create a task management app to help users organize their daily activities efficiently.
workDescription: I designed the UI/UX, developed the frontend using React, and set up a backend with Node.js and MongoDB.
